subject: Urgent: Q4 Budget Review Meeting Tomorrow
body:
Hi,

We need to finalize the Q4 budget before the board meeting. Can you prepare a detailed breakdown of last quarter's spending? Please have it ready by 10 AM tomorrow.

Thanks,
John

subject: TechCrunch Daily: AI Breakthroughs This Week
body:
Stay updated with the latest in tech!

- OpenAI announces new GPT model
- Google releases Gemini 2.0
- Meta's new AI research

Read more on TechCrunch...

subject: Action Required: Code Review for Feature X
body:
Hey team,

I've uploaded the new feature branch for code review. Please review by EOD Friday and leave comments in the PR.

PR Link: https://github.com/project/pull/456

Thanks!

subject: You have 5 new profile views
body:
Great news! 5 people viewed your profile this week.

See who they are and expand your network.
Click here to learn more...

subject: Re: Project Scope Discussion - Need Your Input
body:
Hi,

Following up on our call yesterday. We need to decide on the final scope for the MVP.

Can you confirm:
1. Are we keeping the payment integration in Phase 1?
2. What's your timeline for the API documentation?
3. Do we need to hire QA before we start?

Please respond ASAP.

Best,
Alex

subject: Reminder: Annual Performance Review Scheduled
body:
Your annual performance review is scheduled for next Thursday at 2 PM with your manager.

Please prepare your self-assessment and submit it to HR by Wednesday.

Human Resources Team

subject: Weekly Standup: Please Update Your Status
body:
Hi team,

Please update your status for this week's standup meeting:
- What did you complete?
- What are you working on?
- Any blockers?

Reply to this email or fill the form here: [link]

Deadline: Friday 5 PM

body:
Your expense report has been submitted for review.

subject: Exciting Opportunity: Senior Engineer Role
body:
Hi,

We saw your profile and think you'd be a great fit for our Senior Engineer position.

Company: TechCorp
Location: Remote
Salary: $200K - $250K

Would you be interested in a quick chat?

Best,
Sarah (Recruiter)

body:

subject: Partnership Proposal - Let's Discuss Next Steps
body:
Hi,

Following up on our initial conversation. We believe there's a great opportunity to collaborate on the new product launch.

Could we schedule a call next week to discuss terms and timeline?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Regards,
Michael

subject: You were mentioned in Issue #789 on project/repo
Action Item: Please Complete the Brand Survey by Friday
body:
Hey,

As part of our rebrand initiative, we need all employees to complete a quick 5-minute survey about brand values and company culture.

Please submit by Friday EOD.

Survey Link: [link]

Thanks for your input!

Marketing Team
